tool_description: Powerful and Easy to use  API to get and calculate domain age
name: Domain Age Checker V8
title: Domain Age Checker V8

api_list.name: Get Domain Age
api_list.description:
This endpoint gets and calculate any domain age in years months and days. 

Enter a domain without "http://" or "https://" 

example:
rapidapi.com

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Enter a domain without http:// or https://

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-age-checker-v8.p.rapidapi.com/domainage/rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-age-checker-v8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-age-checker-v8.p.rapidapi.com/domainage/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-age-checker-v8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
